amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds from the Special Defense Acquisition Fund to aid Saudi Arabia or the United Arab Emirates if such assistance could be used to conduct or continue hostilities in Yemen.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to prohibit funds from the Special Defense Acquisition Fund to aid Saudi Arabia or the United Arab Emirates if such assistance could be used to conduct or continue hostilities in Yemen.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lieu, Ted amendment (A016) Agreed to by recorded vote: 239 - 187 (Roll no. 448).

action.text: Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Lieu, Ted.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
